Description: Username to access Stardog graph database that API will communicate with
Password to access Stardog graph database that API will communicate with
IP address for the graph database (or container name, if graph is hosted locally)
Name of graph database endpoint to query (e.g., for a Stardog database, this will take the format of `{database_name}/query`)
Whether to return only dataset-level query results (including data locations) and exclude subject-level attributes. One of [true, false]
Port number on the _host machine_ to map the API container port to
Port number on which to run the API

Origins allowed to make cross-origin resource sharing requests. Multiple origins must be separated with spaces in a single string enclosed in quotes. _NOTE: To make the API accessible from a frontend query tool, the origin must be explicitly set. See_ † _for more info_
Path to directory containing a Stardog license file on the _host machine_
Path to directory for graph databases in the _graph server container_
Port number on the _host machine_ to map the graph server container port to
Port number used by the _graph server container_
